controller

Class GameTimeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GameTimeController

  • public class GameTimeController
extends java.lang.Object
    GameTimeController class is responsible for handling and keeping track of the in-game time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean gameIsRunning 
      private static int minutes 
      private static int seconds 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameTimeController()
      GameTimeController() is a Default Constructor that keeps track of the in-game time taken.

    • Method Summary

      • gameIsRunning

      • seconds

      • minutes

        private static int minutes

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameTimeController

        public GameTimeController()
        GameTimeController() is a Default Constructor that keeps track of the in-game time taken. Uses a Timer to increment the seconds and minutes.

    • Method Detail

      • resetGameTime

        public void resetGameTime()
        resetGameTime method resets the time taken back to 0 min:0 sec Sets seconds and minutes to 0. set isGameRunning as False to indicate game has not started.

      • getSeconds

        public int getSeconds()
        Getter method for the seconds variable.
        Returns:
        returns the seconds value

        returns the minutes value

      • setMinutes

        Setter method for setting the minutes.
        Parameters:
        minutes - minutes value

      • setGameIsRunning

        public void setGameIsRunning(boolean gameIsRunning)
        Setter method to store the boolean value of the gameIsRunning variable.
        Parameters:
        gameIsRunning - boolean value to notify is game is running or not

      • isGameRunning

        public boolean isGameRunning()
        Getter method to access the value of gameIsRunning variable.
        Returns:
        returns a boolean value to notify if game is running or not
